mapper.select: select inquiry_id, user_name, user_email, user_phone, inquiry_title, inquiry_content, inquiry_type, write_date, answer_date, inquiry_status from inquiry order by inquiry_id desc;
mapper.insert: insert into inquiry (user_name, user_email, user_phone, inquiry_title, inquiry_content, inquiry_type, write_date) value (#{user_name}, #{user_email}, #{user_phone}, #{inquiry_title}, #{inquiry_content}, #{inquiry_type}, now())
mapper.select: select inquiry_id, user_name, user_email, user_phone, inquiry_title, inquiry_content, inquiry_type, write_date, answer_date, inquiry_status from inquiry where inquiry_id=#{inquiry_id}
